column4: I can't upload any file to a web host. does this relate to ubuntu? any Idea?
probably not, but hard to say when no other detail is provided ;)
tell if any detail is needed?
indeed more detail is needed
sorry, but I dont know what details should I say.
how do you upload to your host? FTP? what error prompt do you get when trying to upload?
no, I upload through web browser. and I want to upload to mediafire, 4shared and s.th like these
that sounds like an Internet service issue. has this kind of problem ever presented itself in the past?
no, never had such a problem. but now I have this problem for 4 days. checked with firefox and konqueror and the result was the same
can you successfully load the host's Website?
mediafire give this error : ERROR: Invalid key state, no status
yes
perhaps the service is down?
I tried with other services too
other services as in other sites? and you get the same prompt, or you just can't upload files?
yes, other sites, and the upload progress stays in 1% in all of them
what's the size of your files? because that sounds like RTO due to limits set by hosts
just 6 mb. I've uploaded 50mb files before on mediafire
i can't turn up anything from here. it may be that your ISP blocked the service
I have upload with bittorrent client. anyway, thank you. I should call the ISP I think
bittorrent? that would take quite some time. you might want to look into free webhosts instead. but do call your ISP
